formatDescription: fdx files are generated by Final Draft, software for writing and formatting screenplays. The software is paid for, available for Windows and Mac, and the first version was launched in 1990. Versions 8 and onwards of Final Draft output an xml based text file.

internalSignatures.name: Final Draft Document v.8 onwards
internalSignatures.note:
BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><FinalDraft DocumentType=
EOF, offset zero:</FinalDraft>

internalSignatures.name: Final Draft Document v.8 onwards
internalSignatures.note:
BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><FinalDraft DocumentType=
EOF, offset zero:</FinalDraft>
